name: Treasure Venture
description:
Treasure Venture: Quest for the Golden Chalice is an illustrated text adventure in which you, Mark the adventurer, has to embark on a quest to find a mysterious golden chalice. If Mark is unsuccessful, he will be executed by his king. In order to find this chalice Mark will have to search for three colored gems hidden among the desert world of Keeto and its underground caverns. The journey is not an easy one, but you're up for the challenge. Find the golden chalice and save your own life. 

Play Treasure  Venture online: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/hmd5arvadeefdd_5hob2fg/treasure-venture
